text: The Premier of Nunavut is the first minister for the Canadian territory of Nunavut. The Premier is the territory's head of government and de facto chief executive, although their powers are somewhat smaller than those of a provincial premier. The premier of Nunavut (and the cabinet) is directly elected by the non-partisan members of the Legislative Assembly. They are then formally appointed by the Commissioner of Nunavut.Legislative Assembly of Nunavut Frequently Asked QuestionsThe Role of the Commissioner of Nunavut ==References== *
title: Premier of Nunavut
